text: That sounds amazing, I can really understand the passion you have for travelling from the way you write. I love Jamaica and Dominica, I think it is the relaxed way of life. They are all very friendly and I love to see the natural waterfalls and rainforests. Jamaica for me is one of the most amazing places I have been to, I paid a local to take me to the non tourist areas which were beautiful and he only charged the equivalent of Â£10 for a full day, I gave him quite a bit more and he said he would not need to work for the month now as I had paid his monthly wage. The different way of living is unbelievable!
You should definitely be in tourism, you have a great passion for it!

Yeah I like the way of life in Africa too, its a lot better to spend your time relaxing somewhere hot.  It is also incredible how much of a difference tourists make in developing countries. I would like to work in tourism but i'm not quite sure of the job role id be best suited for?
Completely agree, without tourism these countries would be a lot worse. How much do you enjoy writing? Would a tourism journalist be a good match for you?
Yeah maybe I'll have to look into that one.
